title: Pixel 3 - Android 10 - Ambient Display Settings Gone
content:
I'm trying to disable the ambient display on my Pixel 3 to save some battery life, but the menu options is no longer there.

I used to be able to go Settings > Display > Ambient Display, but there is no longer an "Ambient Display" menu option on the Display settings page at all. Where do you change these settings now?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
